main event: On September 8, 1961, an unidentified object was observed in Sidney, Ohio, appearing to change color and size while moving in a southwestern direction.
interesting points: The object was radar viewed,The sighting lasted between 6 to 10 seconds,The object coasted from southwest to southeast,The object emitted a bright whitish color and was brighter than the brightest stars,The witness was a civilian and reported seeing the object while stopped in their car.
sighted object: an unidentified object changing color and size
witness description: a civilian who reported the sighting.
